Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of the officer's decision to set a removal date

Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to consider critical medical logistics

Crimes.Assessment_Factor: Availability and accessibility of life-sustaining treatment in destination countries

Crimes.Evidence_Assessed: Medical records and expert statements on health prognosis
